update questioninfo
question_type = #{questionType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
question_level = #{questionLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
question_content = #{questionContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
option_a = #{optionA,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

option_d = #{optionD,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

option_f = #{optionF,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
correct_answer = #{correctAnswer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
correct_score = #{correctScore,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update questioninfo set question_type = #{questionType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, question_level = #{questionLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, question_content = #{questionContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, option_a = #{optionA,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, option_b = #{optionB,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, option_c = #{optionC,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, option_d = #{optionD,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, option_e = #{optionE,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, option_f = #{optionF,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, correct_answer = #{correctAnswer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, correct_score = #{correctScore,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
